name: きずぐすり
description: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

name: スピーダー
description: During this turn, the Retreat Cost of your Active Pokémon is 1 less.

name: ハンドスコープ
description: Your opponent reveals their hand.

name: ポケモン図鑑
description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: モンスターボール
description: Put 1 random Basic Pokemon from your deck into your hand.

name: レッドカード
description: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 3 cards.

name: 博士の研究
description: Draw 2 cards.

name: ポケモン図鑑
description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: ピカチュウ
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: ミュウツー
description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.
move1description: Discard 2[P]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: ラッキー
description: This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

name: ニャース
description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.
move1description: Draw 1 card.

name: バタフリー
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
abilityDescription: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: ラプラス ex
move1description: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: ピカチュウ
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: ピッピ
description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

name: マンキー
description: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.
move1description: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: フシギバナ
description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
move1description: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: ゲッコウガ
description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.  When it spins them and throws them at high speed,  these stars can split metal in two.
abilityDescription: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: ゴースト
description: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.
move1description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: イワーク
description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: プリン
description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
move1description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: フシギダネ
description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

name: コイル
description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

name: ファイヤー ex
move1description: Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of[R]Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched[R]Pokémon in any way you like.

name: ピカチュウ
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: ツタージャ
description: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

name: ウルガモス
description: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.
move1description: Discard 2[R]Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: カメックス
description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
move1description: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra[W]Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: イーブイ
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
move1description: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: チラチーノ
description: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
move1description: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: ヒトカゲ
description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
move1description: Discard a[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: ゼニガメ
description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: ポッチャマ
description: It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.
move1description: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: ナエトル
description: It uses its whole body to photosynthesize when exposed to sunlight. Its shell is made from hardened soil.

name: エレキブル
description: The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.
move1description: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra[L]Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: クレセリア ex
abilityDescription: Whenever you attach a[P]Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: ムウマ
description: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.
move1description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: エアームド
description: People fashion swords from Skarmory’s shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.
move1description: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: ヒコザル
description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can’t extinguish the fire.

name: トゲピー
description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: ダークライ ex
abilityDescription: Whenever you attach a[D]Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: チェリム
description: After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It’s full of energy while it’s like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.
move1description: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: ライチュウ
description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
abilityDescription: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.
move1description: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: ノズパス
description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it’s in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.
move1description: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.

name: フカマル
description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: ムクホーク
description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
abilityDescription: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from[F]Pokémon.

name: マナフィ
description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.
move1description: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a[W]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

name: カビゴン
description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
move1description: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: モトトカゲ
description: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.
move1description: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overacceleration attack does +20 damage.

name: ニャオハ
description: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.
move1description: Put 1 random[G]Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: フローゼル
description: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.
move1description: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: パーモット
description: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.
abilityDescription: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: カイリキー
description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
move1description: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra[F]Energy attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: アーボ
description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.
move1description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: ビッパ
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

name: パチリス
description: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.
move1description: Take a[L]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched[L]Pokémon.

name: リオル
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: タマタマ
description: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.
move1description: Take a[G]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: ケロマツ
description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: カモネギ
description: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: レックウザ
description: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
move1description: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: レックウザ ex
move1description: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.

name: レックウザ ex
move1description: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.

name: ミミッキュ
description: There was a scientist who peeked under Mimikyu’s old rag in the name of research. The scientist died of a mysterious disease.
move1description: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon.

name: コスモッグ
description: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn’t seem to care.
move1description: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: ルガルガン
description: Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp claws and fangs. It loyally obeys the instructions of a Trainer it trusts.
move1description: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: アローラナッシー
description: Blazing sunlight has brought out the true form and powers of this Pokémon.
move1description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: アローラキュウコン
description: A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this Pokémon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped as that deity’s incarnation.
move1description: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: マケンカニ
description: This Pokémon punches trees and eats the berries that drop down, training itself and getting food at the same time.

name: アローラベトベター
description: There are a hundred or so of them living in Alola’s waste-disposal site. They’re all hard workers who eat a lot of trash.
move1description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: ドデカバシ
description: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.
move1description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: ゼラオラ
description: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
abilityDescription: At the end of your first turn, take a[L]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: カミツルギ
description: This Ultra Beast’s body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.

name: ズガドーン
description: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.
move1description: This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itself.

name: デンジュモク
description: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
move1description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: 月食ネクロズマ
description: Lunala no longer has a will of its own. Now under the control of Necrozma, it continuously expels all of its energy.
move1description: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

name: 日食ネクロズマ
description: This is its form while it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.
move1description: Discard a[M]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: ツンデツンデ
description: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
move1description: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: ウルトラネクロズマ ex
move2description: Discard the top 5 cards of each player's deck.

name: ベベノム
description: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
move1description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: ヌイコグマ
description: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.
